# Plot abn data as dot

```{r}
getwd()
load(paste0("exp6_100k_analysis_results.RData"))
```

```{r}
if (SAVEPLOTS){
  PLOTNAME <- "consensus_dag"
  dev.print(svg, filename = paste0("~/ZHAW/paragraphlayout/", FILENAME, PLOTNAME, ".svg"), width = PLOTWIDTH/2, height = PLOTHEIGHT/2)
  cons.dag.plt 
  dev.off()
  abn::toGraphviz(dag.mcmc.boot.th, 
                  data.dists = dist, 
                  data.df = abndata, 
                  outfile =paste0("~/ZHAW/paragraphlayout/", FILENAME, PLOTNAME, ".dot"),
                  directed=TRUE)
  saveRDS(dag.mcmc.boot.th, file = paste0("~/ZHAW/paragraphlayout/", FILENAME, PLOTNAME, ".rds"))

  } else {
  cons.dag.plt
  }
```
